title: Freedmen's Bureau Records: John A. McDonnell to Orlando Brown, October 1, 1867
summary: McDonnell reports on conditions in the four Divisions of his Sub-District, from employment opportunities for blacks, to the availability of legal justice.
keywords: Administration/Bureaucracy, Aid/Relief, Community Values/Local Behavior, Economy, Education, Employment/Labor, Health/Illness, Legal System, Military Authority, Politics/Political Attitudes, Property, Race Relations, Slavery, Violence/Crime, American Civil War
